name: Order of Battle: World War II

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Order of Battle World War II/Order of Battle - WW2.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the gog setup exe
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Order of Battle World War II/Order of Battle - WW2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
